dataQuery.sqlStatement: select cb.incident_number "SR_NUMBER",cb.incident_attribute_5 "CONTACT_NAME",cb.incident_attribute_7 "PREFERRED_CONTACT",cb.incident_attribute_8 "EMAIL",incident_attribute_14 "Phone" ,st.name "STATUS",gp.group_name "GROUP_NAME",cb.incident_attribute_1 "GMIL_ORDER",to_char(cb.creation_date,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI') "SR_CREATED_ON" from cs_incidents_all_b cb, cs_Incident_types_vl vt, cs_incident_statuses_vl st, jtf_rs_groups_vl gp where 1=1 and cb.incident_type_id=vt.incident_type_id and (vt.name=:p_sr_type or :p_sr_type is null) and (gp.group_id=:p_group_name or :p_group_name is null) and cb.owner_group_id=gp.group_id and (st.name=:p_status or :p_status is null) and (cb.incident_attribute_7=:p_preferred_contact or :p_preferred_contact is null) and cb.incident_status_id=st.incident_status_id and (cb.creation_date) between to_date(:p_start_date,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND to_date(:p_end_date,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') order by cb.creation_date
